title: Crime Alert  04.17.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert  04.17.19
description:
35-year-old Robyn Gardner vanishes on a luxury snorkeling vacation in Aruba, but police never find her or a body. A new Netflix documentary series shines a light on the investigation into the disappearance of 3-year-old Madeleine McCann. Search for Timmothy Pitzen goes on after convicted felon pretends to be the missing teen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
